scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently -k -n SERVER,CLIENT,ELECTRON -c green,cyan,magenta "npm:dev:server" "npm:dev:client" "npm:dev:electron:build && npm:dev:electron"
scripts.postbuild:client: rimraf electron/client-build && mkdir electron/client-build && xcopy /E /I /Y client\build electron\client-build >NUL
scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server && npm run build:electron && npm run postbuild:client
